mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM base_attr_info bai INNER JOIN base_attr_value bav ON bai.`id`=bav.`attr_id`
or (bai.`category_id`=#{category1Id} and bai.`category_level`=1)
or (bai.`category_id`=#{category2Id} and bai.`category_level`=2)
or (bai.`category_id`=#{category3Id} and bai.`category_level`=3)
order by bai.`category_level`,bai.`id`

SELECT
from base_attr_info bai INNER JOIN base_attr_value bav on bai.id=bav.attr_id INNER JOIN sku_attr_value sav on bav.id=sav.value_id where sav.sku_id=1
